page.title: 20Sparkwell Guides.
page.content: Guides are girls from the ages of 11 to 15. We meet on Mondays at 7 o'clock in Sparkwell Primary School. Guides were started in 1910 by Lord and Lady Baden-Powell. We wear blue skirts with blue shirts and we also wear red ties with leather woggles and hats. We are called the 1st Sparkwell Guides. We can try to win badges to sew on our sleeves. Some of the badges you can win are for collecting things like stamps. For the 'Friend to animals' badge you have to keep a record of what you have done to look after your pet. On some Monday nights in the summer we go tracking in the woods or cooking up on the moors. This year - 1985 - the Guides are celebrating their 75th Anniversary with all sorts of challenges, camps and campfires. Lisa Wilton, Sarah Masey, Claire Verran and Denise Bevan.
